content: Hello, I am looking for direction to implement US Core DiagnosticReport for Note Exchange profile resource. Is it required to display the "attachment" in the "PresentedForm" only as a text or can we display the results as a PDF or URL to an image (if the image is stored on a server) etc.. Thanks.

Yunwei Wang said:

http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/datatypes.html#Attachment

Thanks. There seems to be some confusion on our side around whether to display "narrative only" content or display any content that falls within the 3 categories for Clinical Notes (Radiology, Cardiology and Pathology)
US Core is silent on Narrative content for DiagnosticReport for notes.

Eric Haas said:

US Core is silent on Narrative content for DiagnosticReport for notes.

Thank you!
